description.value:
[Slotless]

Prerequisites: Tier 2 with any faction, @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.sBXsfT0uYltF8TFE]{Hireling}

Cost: 6 Fame

Effect: When you gain this boon, select one @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.sBXsfT0uYltF8TFE]{Hireling} boon you possess. The selected allyâ€™s proficiency for their selected skills improves to expert, and their modifier to skill checks increases to 4 + your level.

Special: You can purchase this boon multiple times. Each time you purchase this boon, you must apply its benefits to a different @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.sBXsfT0uYltF8TFE]{Hireling} boon.
